CHAT.comment: INV enters room with Robodog.
child moves to floor to play with robodog.
child claps and plays with robodog, but they are out of view of camera.
child is walking around clapping to see what robodog will do.
child starts clapping again and continues to move around the room.
child does something with robodog out of view of camera.
child continues to clap his hands.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom claps once loudly and robodog starts moving, but it still moves when she stops.
mom claps again.
child starts clapping again.
child stops clapping and mom presses button on top of robodog's head.
mom talks to robodog.
child makes barking noises.
child makes more barking noises.
child makes barking noises and starts walking away and mom laughs.
INV takes robodog from room.
INV and mom laugh.
INV puts meerkat on table.
mom talks to meerkat.
mom laughs as child puts meerkat on her head.
child is referring to fish tank.
child places meerkat on table and it falls over and mom laughs.
child brings meerkat back over to mom's head.
child dances meerkat around table.
child brings meerkat over to ledge in front of mirror and has it jump off.
child repeats process and has meerkat land on table which is a pretend body of water.
child makes unintelligible noises and then brings meerkat back to mom's head.
child brings meerkat back over to table and swims him around.
child gives meerkat to mom.
mom talks to meerkat.
mom makes unintelligible noises and flies him in front of child.
child takes meerkat from mom and puts it on her head.
child is making jumping noises.
child flies meerkat around the room.
child talks to meerkat.
child puts meerkat on edge of table and mom takes it.
child talks to meerkat.
mom flips meerkat over backwards.
mom swims meerkat towards child and whistles and then back to chair.
child puts his hands together and runs them over the table while making a whoosh noise.
mom shoots meerkat across table.
child sends meerkat across table to mom.
mom sends meerkat back to child.
mom talks to meerkat.
child jumps meerkat up and down.
INV enters the room.
INV takes meerkat from child.
child covers his eyes.
child moves over to mom to have her cover his eyes.
INV uncovers computer box.
child opens eyes and sees computer box.
child moves over to computer box and then mom moves over.
INV leaves room.
child tries to pick up computer box.
child moves hand over computer box and it makes noise.
mom stands up next to child and he puts his finger over top sensor on computer box.
child puts his fingers over both sensors and computer box flashes and makes noise.
mom and child try to press sensors and computer box makes noise and flashes.
child puts head on computer box.
mom laughs.
mom places finger on top sensor and something happens out of view of camera.
INV covers computer box.
child points to fish tank.
INV brings degu into room.
INV leaves.
child moves to opposite side of table and claps his hands.
child leans over cage and makes a sound, but then moves back over towards mom.
mom gets up and moves to other side of table to stand over cage.
mom talks to degu.
child puts finger over grate.
child demonstrates degu clawing on mom's head.
mom talks to degu.
mom talks to degu.
mom talks to degu.
mom talks to degu.
child runs fingers along grate.
child moves over to other side of table.
INV takes degu from room.
INV uncovers fish tank.
child and mom move over to fish tank.
child points to something in middle of cage.
child buries his face in mom's shoulder.
mom and child move to other side of room.
mom and child speak simultaneously.
mom and child sit on couch.
child crawls under the table.
child gets out from under table and lays on couch.
INV covers fish tank up.
INV brings toy car into the room.
child opens up hood.
child runs car across the table a few times.
mom points to back of car.
child points to side of car.
child makes whoosh noise and pushes car across table.
child makes more noises while pushing car around.
child is looking inside car.
child gives mom the car.
child shows mom to make fingers walk like legs.
child moves car slowly across table.
child points to each end of the table.
child nods his head and gives INV the car.
INV takes the car from the room.
